definition[1]: a loaded vehicle or container is full of things
example[2]: She came back carrying a loaded tray.
example[4]: Giles can afford it – he’s loaded.
definition[3]: a loaded word, statement etc has more meanings than you first realize and is intended to influence the way you think
example[5]: He ‘deserved’ it? That’s a loaded word.
example[7]: Greg used to come home loaded almost every night.
definition[4]: a British magazine for young men, which has articles on sex, music, cars, sport etc, as well as interviews with famous people. The language used is very informal and often very rude, and there are usually pictures of women wearing very little clothing.
example[9]: a ship loaded with 5,000 tons of South Korean rice
